data.text: @SachaPfeiffer @npratc @arishapiro @NPR @NPRextra I like to see that people enjoy....and eat those delicious looking muffins! It´s good to celebrate in a way or other the reopening of NPR headquarters!You can´t imagine how we,Spaniards,love the"fiesta"!We have been  celebrating "Halloween"for some years, though it isn´t Spanish!
@SachaPfeiffer @arishapiro @npratc @NPR @NPRextra I listen about 6hrs a day and am blessed that your in my ear buds
@SachaPfeiffer @npratc @arishapiro @NPR @NPRextra Can’t think of a better voice I’d like to hear right now reporting the news
